title: Top CEOs warn about white-collar job crisis from AI revolution, predict up to 50% entry-level job losses in US workforce
description: Leading CEOs and AI experts warn of a significant jobs crisis in the United States. Artificial intelligence could eliminate up to half of entry-level white-collar positions. Industry giants like Amazon and Walmart anticipate corporate workforce reductions due to AI efficiency gains. Government officials, however, emphasize AI's long-term economic benefits and new job creation.

title: AI headlines the 54th National Marketing Conference
description: FROM a once-futuristic concept often seen in Hollywood films, artificial intelligence (AI) is steadily becoming part of Filipino life, bringing new meaning even to simple household appliances. Originally designed to provide quick access to information and greater convenience, AI has often been clouded by confusion and fears of replacing human capability. Yet, the Philippines remains behind in adoption, leaving opportunities untapped.
